description: After two days of the prosecution’s oral arguments, former President Donald J. Trump’s lawyers argued that he did not encourage violence at the Capitol and that his speech before the riot was protected by the First Amendment.
title: Watch Full Video: Impeachment Trial Turns to Trump’s Defense
